name: parse-epub
description: A modern and modular ePub parser

scripts.bundle: NODE_ENV=production browserify --verbose --debug --transform [ rollupify --config rollup.config.js ] --transform envify --standalone ParseEpub index.js | exorcist dist/parse-epub.js.map > dist/parse-epub.js && uglifyjs --verbose --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 --in-source-map dist/parse-epub.js.map --source-map dist/parse-epub.min.js.map dist/parse-epub.js > dist/parse-epub.min.js
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run bundle && NODE_ENV=development npm run bundle:rollup
scripts.start: watchify --transform babelify --outfile playground/app.js playground/app.js & static playground --cache 0 -a 0.0.0.0
